column1: # The 'genes' scripts will use this table to generate the tracer indices.
# - Comment lines starting with '#' are ignored
# - The 'name' is the short name that will appear in the indices
# - The 'description' is a long name which might be used in output.
# - Units are probably 'ppb' for gasses and 'ug/m3' for aersols.
#   These will end up in the 'specunit' array.
# - The molecure 'formula' are used to compute the molecule mass.

column2: the value "R" denotes an unspecified group

column1: #   and is given a dummy mass (1e3 kg/mol or so).
#   The formula are also used to scan for certain atoms as used in the labeling
#   for example all tracers with a 'N' to trace the origin of nitrogen mass.
# - The 'groups' are space seperated lists with group names that are used to select tracers.
# - The 'properties' are space seperate list of properties assigned to a tracer.
#   Fore example used to create index groups
#   with all indices for seasalt tracers.
#     Collected tracers from model version v1.7.3 .
#     Tracer order following reactions in original Iter routine.
#     Added "units" column to explicitly define the tracer units;

column2: if the "aerosol" property was set the units were "ug/m3"
